useCase.name: Activate Trial or Paid Plan

preconditions.precondition: User is logged into the application.

successEndConditions.condition: Auto SDK successfully sends the event to Alexa.

failureEndConditions.condition: Auto SDK fails to send the event to Alexa.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the 'Activate Trial' or 'Activate Paid Plan' button.

mainSequence.step: User clicks 'Activate Trial' or 'Activate Paid Plan' button on the screen.
Application publishes SendConnectivityEvent message specifying ACTIVATE_TRIAL or ACTIVATE_PAID_PLAN event to Auto SDK Engine.
Auto SDK Engine initiates the Data Plan Subscription event to Alexa.
Auto SDK Engine receives SendConnectivityEventReply message with SUCCESS status from Application.
